title: Phrack XVII Introduction
historical_context: This introduction marks the return of Phrack after a hiatus, reflecting the ongoing evolution of hacker culture in the late 1980s.
target_audience: Hackers, phreakers, and enthusiasts of hacker culture.
short_summary: The introduction to Phrack XVII discusses the challenges faced in compiling this issue and highlights the collaborative effort behind it. It also hints at changes in editorial leadership for future issues.
summary: In the introduction to Phrack XVII, Shooting Shark expresses excitement about the return of the zine after a period of procrastination and difficulty in compilation. He acknowledges the contributions from various authors, emphasizing the collaborative spirit that defines this issue. The introduction serves as a farewell of sorts for Shooting Shark, who notes that he will not be involved in the next issue, hinting at a transition in editorial leadership. Despite these changes, he expresses confidence in the longevity and vitality of Phrack as a cornerstone of hacker culture.
additional_notes: This introduction sets the tone for the issue, indicating a rich collection of articles that follow, showcasing the diverse interests and expertise within the hacker community.
